title: SC EP:23 Running from Bigfoot
itunes:title: SC EP:23 Running from Bigfoot
description: Doug Retzer joins the show tonight to share his encounters with Sasquatch. As a young man hunting he saw a Sasquatch for the first time through his rifle scope, many years later he had an encounter with one while fishing and ran for his life.
content:encoded: Doug Retzer joins the show tonight to share his encounters with Sasquatch. As a young man hunting he saw a Sasquatch for the first time through his rifle scope, many years later he had an encounter with one while fishing and ran for his life.

itunes:author: Sasquatch Chronicles - Bigfoot Encounters
